mapper.sql: wiil.inventory_log_id, wiil.material_owner_id, wiil.warehouse_id, wiil.storage_id, wiil.material_id, wiil.supplier_id, wiil.inventory_status_name, wiil.job_order_type, wiil.add_or_subtract, wiil.related_order_code, wiil.production_date, wiil.expired_date, wiil.qc_date, wiil.batch_code, wiil.asn_code, wiil.despatch_order_code, wiil.pallet_code, wiil.initial_qty, wiil.change_qty, wiil.final_qty, wiil.status, wiil.remark, wiil.org_id, wiil.create_user_id, wiil.create_time, wiil.modified_user_id, wiil.modified_time, wiil.is_delete
mapper.select: SELECT inventory_status_name FROM base_inventory_status WHERE inventory_status_id=#{inventoryStatusId}
